name: The Player
descriptionShort: In this section we create the player and its basic mechanics.
description: In this section you will be introduced to Crafty JS, creating our base player and making it be able to jump and be affected by a form of gravity.

lessons.name: part1-1
lessons.description: Here we introduce you to Crafty JS and entities

lessons.name: part1-2
lessons.description: In this lesson you will draw the player's avatar using an entity

lessons.name: part2-1
lessons.description: Here we consider the types of movement that a player will undergo in our game

lessons.name: part2-2
lessons.nameNice: Keeping Track of the Players Motion
lessons.description: You will set up some variables which will keep track of and affect player movement

lessons.name: part2-3
lessons.description: This section introduces you to game loops within games engines and frameworks, as well as Craftys own version

lessons.name: part2-4
lessons.nameNice: Updating the Player's Position and Velocity
lessons.description: Here you will use the game loop to make a gravitational force act on your player and then move the player based on their speed

lessons.name: part2-5
lessons.description: In this lesson you'll introduce keyboard interaction and allow the player to affect the game
